passives.name: Accretion
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects against enemy champions generate 1 and 5 stacks of ''Accretion'', respectively, up to 50. For each ''Accretion'' stack, gain {{as|10% '''base''' health regeneration}}, up to {{as|500% '''base''' health regeneration}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Additionally, for every 10 ''Accretion'' stacks, gain 20% increased size, up to 100% at '''maximum''' stacks. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

active.name: Dark Star
active.effects: Summon a black hole at the target location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay that lasts for 2 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} seconds. Enemies within are dealt {{as|{{pp|30 to 100}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|5}}% of user's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} every second, {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30%, and {{tip|kinematics|dragged}} inward until they reach the horizon at the center. Additionally, for each enemy champion inside the black hole, generate 1 stack of ''Accretion'' per second.

effects_structured.raw: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects against enemy champions generate 1 and 5 stacks of ''Accretion'', respectively, up to 50. For each ''Accretion'' stack, gain {{as|10% '''base''' health regeneration}}, up to {{as|500% '''base''' health regeneration}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Additionally, for every 10 ''Accretion'' stacks, gain 20% increased size, up to 100% at '''maximum''' stacks. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

Summon a black hole at the target location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay that lasts for 2 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} seconds. Enemies within are dealt {{as|{{pp|30 to 100}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|5}}% of user's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} every second, {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30%, and {{tip|kinematics|dragged}} inward until they reach the horizon at the center. Additionally, for each enemy champion inside the black hole, generate 1 stack of ''Accretion'' per second.
